keyMoments.title: Donquixote Pirates Executive Meeting
keyMoments.description: The top executives of the Donquixote Pirates gather for a meeting at Dressrosa. Diamante, Trebol, Pica, Baby 5, and other officers are introduced.
keyMoments.significance: First full introduction of the Donquixote Pirates' executive structure and hierarchy, establishing the main antagonist force of the Dressrosa Arc.

keyMoments.title: Donquixote Pirates Obtain Mera Mera no Mi
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo reveals that the Donquixote Pirates possess the Mera Mera no Mi and plan to use it as bait in the Corrida Colosseum tournament.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's ability to acquire powerful Devil Fruits and their strategic use of resources for manipulation.

members.joinCircumstances: Founder and leader of the Donquixote Pirates
Revealed as top executive in charge of Corrida Colosseum
Revealed as top executive and close advisor to Doflamingo

bases.description: Dressrosa serves as Doflamingo's kingdom and the Donquixote Pirates' main base of operations

jollyRoger.description: A skull with sunglasses and a mischievous grin, with crossbones behind it

reveals.information: Crew has a structured hierarchy with three main armies (Diamante, Trebol, Pica)
Possesses the Mera Mera no Mi

keyMoments.title: Doflamingo Resigns from Seven Warlords
keyMoments.description: Donquixote Doflamingo officially resigns from his position as one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea, creating a vacancy in the organization.
keyMoments.significance: Disrupts the balance of power in the New World and sets up the Dressrosa Arc conflict.

keyMoments.title: Current Warlords Roster Revealed
keyMoments.description: Commodore Brannew announces the current Seven Warlords roster: Mihawk, Doflamingo (resigned), Kuma, Boa Hancock, Law, Buggy, and one mysterious member.
keyMoments.significance: Updates viewers on the post-timeskip Warlords lineup and confirms several new appointments.

members.joinCircumstances: One of the original Seven Warlords
Became Warlord during timeskip by delivering 100 pirate hearts
Appointed after his actions at Marineford and connection to Roger

reveals.information: Buggy officially revealed as new Warlord
Buggy leads the Pirate Dispatch organization
